direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods return sets derived from the map, but for different components (entries vs. keys).
Both methods return collections derived from the map, but for different components (entries vs. values).
Both methods involve iterating over map components, but one returns a set of entries and the other an iterator.
Both methods handle the creation of unmodifiable sets from map entries, but one is internal and the other is a utility method.
Both methods create unmodifiable sets, but for different types of sets (entries vs. keys).
Both methods create unmodifiable collections, but for different types of collections (entries vs. values).
